DOC.brief_title: Management Palmar Hyperhidrosis With Hydrogel-based Iontophoresis
DOC.detailed_description: Palmar hyperhidrosis affect 4.3 million Americans result substantial quality life impairment . Treatment option palmar hyperhidrosis include antiperspirant , systemic anticholinergic agent , botulinum toxin injection , iontophoresis . Standard iontophoresis involve submerge hand tap water current apply palm 30 minute per day 3 time per week . While effective , treatment adherence rate low . This small feasibility study evaluate use hydrogel electrode pad ( rather tap water bath ) deliver iontophoresis treatment use traditional iontophoresis device . Hydrogel electrode pad permit improve mobility hand functionality iontophoresis treatment session .
